message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $22,000. I believe it holds significant value and this price reflects its worth.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest, but $10,000 is too low for me.  Could you do $18,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet your asking price. Would you consider $16,000?
